media.caption: Whitney Houston performing on her My Love is Your Love Tour in Hamburg.

text.headline:
Whitney Houston
1963 - 2012
text.text: Houston's voice caught the imagination of the world propelling her to superstardom at an early age becoming one of the most awarded performers of our time. This is a look into the amazing heights she achieved and her personal struggles with substance abuse and a tumultuous marriage.

media.caption: Houston's mother and Gospel singer, Cissy Houston (left) and cousin Dionne Warwick.
media.credit:
Cissy Houston photo:Tom Marcello
Dionne Warwick: CBS Television via Wikimedia Commons

text.headline: DOJ Blocks Merger of Rockford Memorial and SwedishAmerican Corporations
text.text: In 1989, the Department of Justice filed a complaint to prevent and restrain the merger of Rockford Memorial Corporation and SwedishAmerican Corporation. The government also moved for a preliminary injunction to enjoin the companies from taking any action to proceed with the consolidation. The district court determined that the merger would likely hurt competition in the relevant market and, accordingly would violate the Clayton Act, and the Seventh Circuit
